tool_description: Monitors vendor certificates, licenses, and credentials, tracking expiration dates and generating renewal alerts to maintain qualification status.

alert_days.description: Days before expiration to trigger alerts

error_messages: Registration not found: The provided registration_id does not exist in the system.
Invalid alert period: alert_days must be between 1 and 365.
No certificates found: No certificates are registered for this vendor.
usage: Provide registration_id to track certificates. Optionally set alert_days to customize when expiration warnings are generated. The tool returns current certificate status and upcoming renewals.
